name: TerabyteMicrosystems
overview:
Terabyte MicroSystems. Bringing a new meaning to your ICT solutions and services. Our core services

We offer the best ICT solutions and services, helping your business to be ahead front and overtake your competitors. Our services ranges from Web design and Hosting services, Desktop Application Development and Deployment, ICT personel Training to sales and supply of ICT equipments, Network and Networking Installation.

Our Company is well known for its excellency in giving the best ICT solutions and services. Contact us today for your ICT solutions today and you will be glad you did.
